case.name: Wilkshire v Registrar of Trade Marks (includes corrigendum dated 14 December 2009) [2009] FCA 1222 (30 October 2009)

citances.sentence: This is an application for leave to appeal from a judgment of Finn J, summarily dismissing an application for an order under s 88(1) of the Trade Marks Act 1995 (Cth): [2009] FCA 1222 ; 83 IPR 71. The application was dismissed with costs, however Finn J subsequently varied the order for costs, and, for reasons given on 15 December 2009, his Honour ordered that the applicant pay the second respondent's costs on an indemnity basis; Wilkshire v Registrar of Trade Marks (No.2) [2009] FCA 1505.
